duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle a caseload of family law matters, including divorce, child custody, child support, spousal support, property division, and more.
Conduct legal research, draft legal documents, and provide accurate legal advice to clients.
Represent clients in court hearings, mediation sessions, and negotiations.
Collaborate with senior attorneys and support staff to develop effective case strategies.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of relevant laws and regulations in Virginia.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree from an accredited law school.
Admission to the Virginia State Bar in good standing.
Proven experience of 2-5 years practicing family law, including courtroom experience.
